grouped list of all github repos
I added a grouped list of all GitHub repos of Cordova.
Deprecate template-reference in favor of app-hello-world
add link to cordova-status page and hide deprecated repos

This pull requests creates the `tweets/` folder where your `*.tweet` files go into. It also creates the `tweets/README.md` file with instructions.

Note that if you plan to support tweets with polls, your twitter app has to be approved for Twitters Ads API. See [The Ads API Application Form](https://github.com/gr2m/twitter-together/blob/master/docs/03-apply-for-access-to-the-twitter-ads-api.md) documentation for more details.

Enjoy!

### Motivation and Context
<!-- Why is this change required? What problem does it solve? -->
<!-- If it fixes an open issue, please link to the issue here. -->
Provide a high-level overview about the package relationships in a prominent place.


### Description
<!-- Describe your changes in detail -->
Added a sketchy dependency graph of a subset of Cordova. Including a link to the Graphviz source code, so the graph can be adjusted if necessary.
Tweet announcement linking to the blog post: https://cordova.apache.org/announcements/2020/08/31/cordova-ios-6.1.1.html

Add following plugins to active list:

- apache/cordova-plugin-device-motion
- apache/cordova-plugin-device-orientation
- apache/cordova-plugin-file-transfer
Removed deprecation text for plugins that have been undeprecated

- cordova-plugin-file-transfer
- cordova-plugin-device-orientation
- cordova-plugin-device-motion
